PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Productive HR professional familiar with recruitment, training, and records management. Helps onboard and 
retain employees with excellent training and morale -building strategies. Highly organized and detail -oriented 
with diligent mindset and good multitasking abilities.

Al Warqa, Dubai, UAE, 00971561705959, gracemariflorlopez@gmail.com  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Productive HR professional familiar with recruitment, training, and records management. Helps onboard and 
retain employees with excellent training and morale -building strategies. Highly organized and detail -oriented 
with diligent mindset and good multitasking abilities.  
SKILLS  
• HRIS (Menaitech, Zoho People)  • HR Management and Policy 
Development  • Workforce Planning, Recruitment and 
Onboarding  
• Applicant Tracking Systems 
and MIS  • Payroll and Benefits 
Administration  • Proven ability to work independently and 
collaboratively with all levels of employees  
• Analytical and Problem -solving 
skills  • Microsoft Office Applications  
(Word, PowerPoint  and Excel)  • Business Acumen  and Interest  
• Tech and Social Media Savvy  • Self-starter  • Insightful and Resourceful  
EXPERIENCE  
Human Resources Specialist - Group   
National Paints Holdings  | Sharjah , UAE   January 2017 - Current  
• Contributes in developing HR Agenda, strategies, policies and practices that suits and improves 
company culture, streamline HR process to increase the ability of HR Department to provide services to 
the employees  
• Forecasted expected personnel demands, coordinate with the managers and assist i n creating a 
departmental manpower plan and developed forward - thinking approaches to achieve objectives.  
• Responsible for sourcing potential candidate through multiple channels (e.g. LinkedIn, Social Media, 
Recruitment Portals, etc.), Plan interview and se lection procedures, including screening calls, 
assessments and in -person interviews, assess candidate information, including resumes and contact 
details, using our Applicant Tracking System and provided new hire orientations and onboarding for 
new employee s 
• Provides HR policy guidance and interpretation, deliver proactive insights for HR needs, manages and 
resolves complex employee relations issues. Conducts effective, thorough and objective investigations.  
• Worked as an effective team member while contribut ing to local and regional HR projects.  
• Prepare and process monthly payroll and administer benefits for Group employees, verify payroll 
process and gather management approval for Business unit’s payroll process.  

Administrative Senior Executive  
Garage Studio  | Dubai , United Arab Emirates   January 2019 - Current  
• Manage HR and Administration process of Garage Studio through HR recordkeeping, including enticing 
new hires, status changes and update legal business documents.  
• Set-up the accounting system of Garage  studio by researching multiple providers and migrates current 
client records and company records to ensure accurate records and reports.  
• Receives client inquiries regarding studio rentals or production, issue quotations, process invoice and 
payment receip ts.  
• Assisted with month -end and year -end accounting reporting by reconciling accounts and preparing 
financial statements.  
• Provide direction and guidance with certain projects in terms of set -up build and props procurement  
• Filled in for upper management as  directed in handling routine operations, events and special projects 
with knowledgeable leadership.  
• Coordinate with suppliers and conduct market visits to procure props and other equipment/utilities 
needed for the studio  
• Receives and manages petty cash fo r Garage Studio, provides report on petty cash spends and request 
for petty cash replenishment as required.  
• Handles certain projects for selected client in terms of planning, content direction and creation  
HR EXECUTIVE   
National Paints Factories  | Sharjah , UAE   June 2014 - December 2016  
• Responsible for full cycle of recruitment and onboarding of National Paints Sharjah, Abu Dhabi and UAE 
subsidiaries.  
• Ensuring all company policies and procedures are up to date in line with current employment law and line 
managers are up to date with changes to any policies.  
• Prepare and process monthly payroll of Sharjah and Abu Dhabi Staff and Labors (1,800 employees) 
ensuring overtime, other income, other deduc

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
